output.sentences: It was a muggy and hot day at the beach.
We walked towards the pier and we can hear a lot of action going on.
Upon arrival we wanted to go ride Turbo but it was shut down due to the coaster malfunctioning.
So we walked around we noticed there were many charactors.
There were a all male Elvis Presley contest at the end of the boardwalk.
